original_text: But two important men were not happy when they heard that I had come to help the Israelite people. They were Sanballat, who came from Horon, and Tobiah, an Ammonite officer.
korean_text: 호론 사람 산발랏과 종이었던 암몬 사람 도비야가 이스라엘 자손을 흥왕하게 하려는 사람이 왔다 함을 듣고 심히 근심하더라

sentences.original_text: But two important men were not happy
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 두 명의 중요한 사람들은 기뻐하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: when they heard that I had come
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내가 왔다는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: They were Sanballat, who came from Horon
